physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a narrow river taken in Buitenzorg (Bogor)
 Indonesia. The river is in the middle of steep hills on either side. On the left side of the river
 there is a small waterfall. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a narrow river taken in Buitenzorg (Bogor), Indonesia. The river is in the middle of steep hills on either side. On the left side of the river, there is a small waterfall. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
